tweet: And it's out!  🎉 The #Daedalus Rewards wallet for the #Shelley Incentivized Testnet is now available to download. Choose a pool, delegate your stake and earn real $ada rewards, starting right here:  https://t.co/GLqOC9EwNN #CardanoCommunity #ADA
The Cardanians team has prepared a guide on how to delegate $ada coins to our pool with ticker #CRDNS.  It is for #Cardano #Daedalus wallet V1.  Happy staking!  The guide:  https://t.co/yFvpMSViU2

Public Day 1 Testnet Staking...  12.4% of all $ADA in existence has been staked 255 active pools 15.1m average $ADA per pool  Daedalus-Rewards-testnet wallet is live Yoroi-Rewards-testnet wallet will be live in under 24 hours  🤘₳

#Cardano celebrated the launch of the Shelley incentivized testnet, as it debuted with hundreds of pools and over 2.6 billion ADA staked. The testnet currently has 281 staking pools, which is 10 times more than #EOS's 21 and #TRX's 26 (via @priyeshugarg).   https://t.co/YdEeOeSVWL

We are proud to be part of the #Cardano project and participate in decentralization by operating our pool.  We are Cardanians and use ticker #CRDNS.  You can become Cardanian and help us to build the future.

It is amazing how simple it is to delegate $ada to a pool in #Daedalus.  It is a huge step to adoption. Cryptocurrencies must be easy and #Cardano shows how it can look like. I am going to check Yoroi tomorrow.  Good job!  https://t.co/WHdRThLNnE
My pool ID is DIGI - Digital Fortress - thank you everyone for being supportive and Congratulations @Cardano and @InputOutputHK
Cardano’s Shelly testnet has ten times more staking pools than EOS and Tron  https://t.co/CdDir8PHV3 #Cardano $ADA #Tron #TRX #EOS #Blockchain
